Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and I believe it would be a significant asset to you as well. Given its worth to both of us, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $950000.

This price reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while also allowing you to secure this remarkable product at a competitive rate. I understand its value to you is estimated at $1000000, so this offer presents a favorable opportunity for you to own it without exceeding your budget.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
